entry.title: The Travel Yoga Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description
Yoga, stretching, ab work or just a little Savasana - however you decide you want to move today this lightweight mat will get you through it. Designed to roll up and be toted around with it's own included strap or tucked into the straps of your favorite MOVES style. Namaste!
Specifications

Dims: 26"H x 70"W x 4mm
Materials: Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE); Poly webbing strap.
Care: Spray with warm water & a few drops of dish soap or a 3:1 water to vinegar solution. Wipe clean with a damp towel or sponge. Do not leave out in the sun. Do not fold but roll for storage.

 
Details
Made of biodegradable TPE synthetic rubber
Roll up and secure with included strap for easy carry and storage
Engraved BEIS Logo
Light weight

How you can move with this product
Yoga, pilates, any work out that you need a little extra padding! Naps :)

entry.title: The Hanging Shower Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Getting clean never felt so ... clean. This shower caddy was designed to drain and dry so you can get on with your day after that intense (or not so) workout. The mesh material is quick drying and will ensure no pools of water collect. Just enough room for all your shower needs and a few extra necessities.
Specifications

Dims: 9.5"H x 4.5"W x 5"D
Materials: PVC
Care: Clean with warm water and soap, air dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The you gym friendly shower caddy
Mesh material for easy draining and drying
Easy to hang over a shower head, on a hook or clipped over a towel bar
Front flap folds down to show interior
Mesh panel keeps products upright for easy storage and display
Elastic loops for a tooth brush and/or razor
Exterior side zip pocket

How you can move with this product
Cosmetics & toiletries
Shower caddy for gym and beyond
Travel

entry.title: The Sport Wristlet Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description
At first glance this little beauty might look like a cute wristlet, but she is SO much more. Each piece was designed so that you could carry them as a set or individually. The d-ring on each pouch can also be attached to the inside of any BÉIS bag, using our signature key fob (you can find this on interior seam of every BÉIS bag). Even better, the small snap card case comes with a scruchie, take it for a spin on it's own and never have a reason you can't pull your hair back!

 
Specifications

Dims: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: 2.625"H x 3.875"W
ROUND ZIP POUCH: 3.5"W X 3.5"H
RECTANGLE ZIP POUCH: 4.25"H X 7.5"W
Materials: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: Exterior - PU, Interior - Recycled Poly
ROUND AND RECTANGLE POUCHES: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
STRAP: Macrame Nylon Paracord
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The perfect set of accessories to keep all your gym (and beyond) needs organized
3 different pouches:
1 round zip pouch with an interior elasticized slip pocket - perfect for airpods, earbuds, hair accessories, jewelry
1 long zip pouch - perfect for cash, a few makeup items
1 snap envelope pouch perfect for cards - includes a removable scrunchie that can be used to slip the pouch on your wrist or throwing your hair in a pony
Multiple ways to carry
Carry all three together or individually with the provided braided paracord wristlet strap
D-rings on each style so you can easily clip into any BEIS bag’s included key leash
The envelope pouch can slip onto wrist alone using removable scrunchie
How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
The perfect necessities only gym companion

entry.title: The Water Bottle Sling in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 38.00

Description
We are all for extreme sports but there is something nice about a good stroll around the neighborhood. The Water Bottle Sling is like a small handbag with added hydration benefits. Just enough space to hold your water bottle, phone, your keys and a credit card! Brisk walks have met their match!

 
Specifications

Dims: BOTTLE BAG: 8.25”H x 3.5”W x 3.5”D
ZIPPER POUCH: 6.75”H X 3.5” W X 0.75”D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
A crossbody bag big enough for the essentials & securely holds your water bottle
2 ways to carry
Adjustable strap to carry shoulder or crossbody
Side web handle to carry hand-held
EXTERIOR
U-zip cargo pocket - sized to fit up to an Iphone 12
Secure slip pocket inside cargo pocket
INTERIOR
Drawstring & cord lock closure to cinch around water bottle
Fits up to 32 OZ water bottles

How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
The perfect necessities only gym companion

entry.title: E-Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rise.ai
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 500.00 (7 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a gift card.
Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: The Changing Organizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 38.00

Description

When you are always on-the-go - even within your own home - a portable changing pad is a must have! Roomy enough to go from newborn to toddler, padded to provide a protective and comfortable landing space for your little one and folds up to a compact accessory that can go from nursery, to living room, to car, to changing room, anywhere, because we know THAT is not on a schedule!
Specifications

Dims: 21" W x 35" L x 0.5" H
Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Poly Mesh, Lining: 100% Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- larger, portable changing pad
- folds up into easy to grab and go
- wristlet strap with snap for easy carry or to loop around a bag or stroller handle
INTERIOR
- mesh pocket for diapers
- zip pocket for wipes
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel

entry.title: The Tote Insert
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 58.00

Description
While our original thoughts when designing this diaper bag insert were for Mums who want all the organization but to still keep their stylish bags - we realized while testing - just how amazing it is for everyone. Especially to keep that tote you're traveling with organized and in a pinch take out the insert and use the tote for shopping, a beach day, and an extra bag on-the-go! Designed to give you the absolute MOST organization, The Tote Insert, has an abundance of pockets, a padded laptop sleeve, our token key fob, a microsuede lined pocket for sunglasses, and a removable insulated bag for milk, snacks, your lunch, or a refreshing beverage.
Shay's Inspo

"I’ve really outdone myself with this one! Can I say that? Meet the Tote Insert. This is perfect for people who like to switch up their bags every now and again, but who don’t want to go through the rigmarole of taking everything out over and over. This bag ensures that all of your essentials are with you no matter what (BÉIS) bag you want to use."-Shay

Details


A POCKET FOR EVERYTHING

With this diaper bag organizer, there are endless ways to create the perfect way to organize all your baby's and your needs.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY

Regardless if you're going on a long trip or from the couch to the counter - this diaper bag insert makes the perfect companion to keep everything organized in your tote and everywhere in between!

ADAPTABLE

Make any tote bag a diaper bag for anyone who loves to have it all together. Padded Laptop Sleeve: 14.25" W x 9.25" H; Fits most 15" laptops

Stop the pre-flight dig with our two-faced travel companion. Designed to keep your beauty essentials organized from take-off to touch-down with an easy-to-carry handle and a mini-mirror. Tackle your travel beauty routine effortlessly.
Specifications
Dims: 7.5"W X 3.5"H x 5.25"D
Materials:
Body: PU, PVC
Lining: Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.56lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- faux leather fabrication
- gold foil stamped 'let's go" & "we're here" label for compartments
- double sided cosmetic case to separate your take-off and touch-down needs (and beyond)

INTERIOR

entry.title: The Lingerie Packing Cube Set in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

No one wants to be that person whose luggage comes off the carousel with that lone pair of underwear peaking out. This set of packing cubes was designed to prevent that exact type of embarrassment well that and to keep your delicates safely tucked away and easily accessible upon arrival. This 5 piece set was designed to keep your bra cups intact, your dirty and clean underwear separated and the washing of these items when you arrive back home less of a chore.
Shay's Inspo

"Whether you like grannies or something a little lighter in coverage, this set will not only keep you organized while on the go, it also keeps the clean pieces away from the dirty. Light on the unmentionables? These cubes easily double in purpose for other travel essentials." - Shay
Details

5-PIECE SET
Keep your delicates organized
WASH BAG
Easy to unpack & launder 
TO WASH, TO WEAR
Keep dirty & clean items in their place
UNMENTIONABLES
Keep those (wink-wink) items tucked away!
DIMENSIONS
12 x 4 x 9.5

entry.title: The Hanging Cosmetic Case in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 58.00

Description

This well-groomed cosmetic case is a spill-proof protector for your most valuable assets, your skin care and beauty products! Made for the traveler who prefers to take their entire routine with them, no one should have to compromise their skincare regimen, keeping every last essential organized and hanging at your fingertips! Made of durable nylon with a handle to easily tote it around. A useful TSA compliant clear to-go pouch makes carry-on life a breeze. Consider your travel beauty routine handled!
Specifications

Dims: 9.75 x 7.25 x 6.5
Materials:Body - Nylon Twill, Trim - Vegan Buffalo Leather, Lining - Poly w/ Water resistant protective finish, Hardware - Brushed Gold and Matte Black, Pouch - Clear TPU, Zippers Nylon Coil
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1.14lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- Easy to carry top handle with BÉIS logo
- Double U-zip open/closure
- Easy to wipe clean nylon fabric

INTERIOR
- Easy to wipe clean, durable, lining with stain resistant finish
- Removable "To Go" clear zip pouch
- Clear zip pocket
- 2 small mesh elasticized pockets
- 1 large mesh elasticized pocket
- Hidden hanger

PERFECT FOR
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care
-Toiletries
-Makeup Brushes
-All the Hair Ties
-Make-Up Artist

"The Packing Cubes exist to keep me organized and so I can rest assured that when I’m on the road it’s easier to find certain things because, well, they all have their own place. entry.title: The Stroller Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Designed for moms on-the-go, keeping the babe's and your needs at your finger-tips from park to plane! The Stroller Caddy features adjustable straps that snap around the handle of your stroller, a shopping cart, or around the metal brackets of a plane's seatback tray. A removable, adjustable shoulder strap on this stroller caddy makes it easy to take with you and all the pockets include a mesh dump-all compartment, because we know sometimes you gotta make a quick exit! Bonus Feature: we hid tabs in The Diaper Bag that the caddy can easily snap into for a little extra organization!
Specifications

Dims: L: 19", W: 1". H: 14"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Brushed Ice Gold Hardware, Poly Lining, Poly Mesh
Water resistant protective finish
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: .5lbs

EXTERIOR
- 2 bottle pockets with elasticized opening
- 2 zip compartments
- 1 zip pocket
- 1 slip pocket
- adjustable removable shoulder strap strap - for taking with you
- 2 adjustable straps to hook over your stroller or into The Diaper Bag
- Large mesh compartment for loose things with snaps up to become compact

entry.title: The Bottle Cooler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 28.00

Description

You're getting cooler! We designed this must-have baby accessory to keep your babe's bottles at just the right temp, perfect for moms on the go. Ice packs are included with this baby bottle bag to keep things cool until you need to warm them to the babe's liking. This insulated baby bottle bag keeps bottles cool or warm for several hours. A small zip pocket for bottle accessories and an ID window ensures no one steals the babe’s lunch!
